items.content_html: CurlDock: A lightweight, developer-friendly tool for API testing and curl script management. Built with Rust and React, it simplifies the creation, execution, and organization of curl commands through a user-friendly interface. Designed for local development environments, CurlDock emphasizes simplicity and integration with existing workflows.
items.title: ietxaniz/curldock: CurlDock: A lightweight, developer-friendly tool for API testing and curl script management. Built with Rust and React, it simplifies the creation, execution, and organization of curl commands through a user-friendly interface. Designed for local development environments, CurlDock emphasizes simplicity and integration with existing workflows.

items.content_html: ferrydb is a lightweight, event-driven, and type-safe database ORM built on top of SQLite using TypeScript. It simplifies database operations by providing a schema-based model system with built-in validation and type inference.
